categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: "Chaser" was the nickname of a TIE fighter pilot who served within the Galactic Empire. As a member of the Imperial Starfighter Corps, Chaser flew a TIE fighter during combat in the Battle of Yavin, where they were fired upon by a T-65B X-wing starfighter.
